otherNames: Heaven's Lost Property, そらのおとしもの
synopsis:
omoki Sakurai often encounters a strange girl in his dreams asking for his help, but he can’t remember her face when he wakes up.
When an Unidentified Mysterious Animal (U.M.A.) falls out of the sky, his life of pacifism suddenly becomes complicated. The animal turns out to be an angel, Ikaros.
